amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the Agency to detail the effects of exports and projects financed by the Agency on American jobs in the energy, and related technologies, industries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the Agency to detail the effects of exports and projects financed by the Agency on American jobs in the energy, and related technologies, industries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamb amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Lamb.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamb amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
